devdoc.author: GBaltazar
devdoc.details: Gas costs warning: functions may not execute if gas requirements are too high

MEWaddAdmin(address).details: Adds a new admin to the marketplace.

params.newAdmin: Address of the new admin to add.

MEWaddStoreOwner(uint256,address).details: Adds a new store owner from the list of requests.

params.index: among list of requests of the approved store owner.
params.storeOwner: is the address of the store owner that admin approves.

MEWaddStoreOwnerRequest().details: Adds a request for msg.sender to become a store owner

MEWcreateNewStore(string,string).details: create new store contract with msg.sender as owner.

params.description: is the description of the store.
params.name: is the name of the store.

MEWfetchStoreAddressesByOwner().details: fetch list of store contract addresses that msg.sender owns.

MEWfetchStoreOwnerRequests().details: Fetch all the store owner requests.
MEWfetchStoreOwnerRequests().return: List of all the addresses of open requests.

MEWfetchUserType().return: Type of user msg.sender in a string.

MEWwithdraw().details: Admins can withdraw any funds sent to the contract.

constructor.details: set admin as person who instantiated the MEW marketplace contract

devdoc.title: A simulator Marketplace to trade digital representations of Endangered Wildlife (MEW)
